file_content.text: The Imperials are exceeding my expectations. Sobrik's forces have been cut by almost two-thirds. Keep up the pressure.
There goes a flight of Imperial strike bombers. We'll empty Sobrik defenses before you know it. Head for the next comm tower.
Just as I hoped. The Empire mobilized an entire armored battalion. Keep up the good work, my friend.
Excellent. Resistance scouts already detect forces scrambling out of Sobrik. Move on to the next tower.
